New Records: Mohammed Shami became the highest wicket-taker for India in ODI World Cups
India's 302-run victory is now their biggest win in one-day internationals
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli and Shreyas Iyer headlined India's 357 for 8
Mohammed Shami picked up five wickets against Sri Lanka
Jasprit Bumrah struck with the first ball of the innings
Sri Lanka had reached the World Cup after winning the Cricket World Cup qualifiers but their abject display on Thursday was utterly disappointing
Miscellaneous Highlights: India became the first team to reach the semifinals of the 2023 World Cup
Others: India have now reached the semifinals of ODI World Cups for the fourth successive time
India have been just as clinical in 2023. They defeated Australia, Afghanistan, Pakistan, Bangladesh, New Zealand and England before travelling to Mumbai to take on Sri Lanka
